contents.text: Welcome to StubHub in San Francisco, the world’s top destination for ticket buyers and sellers, where prices may be above or below face value.
For event search and seating options, press 1.
Please hold the line and we’ll connect you to our ticketing specialists.

navigationGoals: Find and secure the best available seats for next week’s show
Help me find and buy two veteran-discounted tickets in the lower deck for the next Giants home game.
Query event inventory and reserve two floor-level tickets for next Friday’s concert, with real-time price comparison.
I need help finding and buying accessible aisle seats for an upcoming concert.
I’d like to purchase two tickets for the April physics lecture at Davies Symphony Hall.

contents.text: For order status and ticket codes, press 2.
One moment please, we’re connecting you to our order support team.

navigationGoals: Check the status of my recent ticket order and retrieve the access codes
I need to check the status of my order for the Warriors game and get my digital ticket code.
Retrieve my recent order metadata and resend the mobile ticket barcodes for last night’s arena purchase.
I’d like to check the status of my recent ticket order and get the entry codes.
I need to check my order status and retrieve the ticket codes for the upcoming quantum mechanics conference.

contents.text: To sell tickets or manage your listings, press 2.
To list new tickets for sale, press 1.
Please hold for our seller services department.

navigationGoals: List my extra tickets for sale for the upcoming game
I want to list my extra pair of concert tickets for sale.
Upload a new listing for four playoff game tickets using dynamic pricing algorithms at 10% below face value.
I want assistance listing two event tickets I’m selling.
I want to list two extra tickets for the astrophysics outreach event next month.

contents.text: For seller dashboard and payout inquiries, press 2.
Please remain on the line while we connect you with seller support.

navigationGoals: Confirm that my seller payout has been processed and view my dashboard details
I need to check my seller payout and bank deposit timing for my recent ticket sale.
Access my seller dashboard to review recent sales metrics and initiate an ACH payout to my bank account.
I need to find out when I’ll receive my payout for sold tickets.
I’d like to access my seller dashboard to see the payout details for the particle physics workshop tickets I sold.
